## [[...Auto Appendices!!!]{.automobile .bigger}](https://github.com/cl-roberts/code-appendix) 

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="67%"}

<br>
<br>

```{yaml, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
#| code-line-numbers: "7-10"
---
title: "Tech Report"
author: "Wonderful YouTube People"
format: 
  pdf:
    toc: true
filters:
    - code-appendix
code-appendix-title: "Penguin Appendix (Code be here Yaar)"
code-appendix-file: penguins.R    #<1> 
---

```
1. places all of your code chunk content within a script file within your project folder (note we only tried {{< iconify devicon:r >}} chunks). By default content also appended (can by toggled with values of "true" or "false" to `code-appendix-write:`)
:::

::: {.column width="33%" .smaller}
<br>
<br>
<br>

+ Use commments (`##`) for chunk identification
+ Use [`\newpage`](https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Line_breaks_and_blank_spaces) within {{< iconify vscode-icons:file-type-pdf2 >}} documents

:::
